com.thomsonreuters.upa.transport

Interface UnifiedNetworkInfo


  • public interface UnifiedNetworkInfo
    Options used for configuring a unified/fully connected mesh network.
    See Also:
    ConnectOptions

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String address()
      Address or hostname to connect to/join for all inbound and outbound data.

      Address or hostname to connect to/join for all inbound and outbound data.

      A character representation of an IP address or hostname associated with the local network interface to use for sending and receiving content.

    • Method Detail

      • address

        void address(java.lang.String address)
        Address or hostname to connect to/join for all inbound and outbound data. All data is exchanged on this hostName:serviceName combination.
        Parameters:
        address - the address to set

      • address

        java.lang.String address()
        Address or hostname to connect to/join for all inbound and outbound data. All data is exchanged on this hostName:serviceName combination.
        Returns:
        the address

      • serviceName

        void serviceName(java.lang.String serviceName)
        Port number or service name to connect to/join for all inbound and outbound data. All data is exchanged on this hostName:serviceName combination.
        Parameters:
        serviceName - the serviceName to set

      • serviceName

        java.lang.String serviceName()
        Port number or service name to connect to/join for all inbound and outbound data. All data is exchanged on this hostName:serviceName combination.
        Returns:
        the serviceName

      • interfaceName

        void interfaceName(java.lang.String interfaceName)
        A character representation of an IP address or hostname associated with the local network interface to use for sending and receiving content. This value is intended for use in systems which have multiple network interface cards, and if not specified the default network interface will be used.
        Parameters:
        interfaceName - the interfaceName to set

      • interfaceName

        java.lang.String interfaceName()
        A character representation of an IP address or hostname associated with the local network interface to use for sending and receiving content. This value is intended for use in systems which have multiple network interface cards, and if not specified the default network interface will be used.
        Returns:
        the interfaceName

      • unicastServiceName

        void unicastServiceName(java.lang.String unicastServiceName)
        Port number or service name for any unicast messages such as ACK/NAK traffic or retransmit requests. Only used with connectionType of ConnectionTypes.RELIABLE_MCAST.
        Parameters:
        unicastServiceName - the unicastServiceName to set

      • unicastServiceName

        java.lang.String unicastServiceName()
        Port number or service name for any unicast messages such as ACK/NAK traffic or retransmit requests. Only used with connectionType of ConnectionTypes.RELIABLE_MCAST.
        Returns:
        the unicastServiceName
